body: I miss my wife and kids

For those confused bout the plot This was the tsuyu in beginning was actually toga transforming into her and fucking other class A student, and got their body fluid which allow toga to transform to them. There is several class A girl here but that should be Double ability which transform to toga which transform to class A girl, while the real one fucking nom

Good art, but why are the villains sharing tsuyu with the heros?
